channel.title: Zihao Zhu
channel.description: {"en"=>"This is an academic website for Zihao Zhu to share his experiences, projects, publications and tech/non-tech posts. Zihao is a master student at Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS). His research interests lie in the field of Machine Learning and Computer Vison.", "cn"=>"这是朱梓豪的个人学术主页，用于分享他的个人经历，项目，学术论文，技术相关/不相关的博客。"}

item.title: Awesome papers about visual question answering (VQA)
item.description:
【NIPS 2014】 A Multi-World Approach to Question Answering about Real-World Scenes based on Uncertain Input

本文是 VQA 的概念萌芽作，但此后的文章【2015 VQA Visual Question Answering】认为本文定义的问题把 answers 限制在了预定义的 16 种基础颜色和 894 种目标类别中，只算 VQA Efforts，没有真正定义 VQA。
